site.title: MBCT Trainee Hub
site.description: A collaborative space for MBCT trainees to share bios, lectures, interviews, and opportunities.

sections.title: Designing a space for our trainee community
sections.summary: MBCT brings together neuroscientists, technologists, and clinicians. This hub celebrates that collaboration with a living directory of bios, lectures, interviews, and opportunities.

sections.title: Build a collective directory
sections.summary: Publish a bio, research interests, and collaboration requests so fellow trainees can connect with you.

sections.title: Curate lectures and learning sessions
sections.summary: Document recordings, notes, and resources from MBCT events to keep the community in sync.

sections.title: Capture the voices shaping MBCT
sections.summary: Share interviews with mentors, alumni, and collaborators to highlight diverse pathways into MBCT.

sections.title: Keep opportunities within reach
sections.summary: Track fellowships, lab rotations, and funding windows so trainees can act on new possibilities.

sections.title: Resources to help you contribute
sections.summary: Templates and checklists that simplify publishing new content on the MBCT hub.
